issue.title: Any help on how to fly UAVs inside tunnel?

content.raw:
A good place to start will be the [Wiki](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/Home).  The recent changes to the control of UAVs have increased the amount of effort required prior to successfully flight so I recommend starting with UGVs and then progressing to UAVs.

Nonetheless, documentation how the configurations of the two available UAVs can be found [here](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots) and information on how to access data from sensor feeds as well as how to send commands to a UAV can be found [here](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api).  An important note about the API for the UAVs is while the topic name is `cmd_vel` the values are intended to be forces as opposed to velocities.

Some additional tutorials for control/utilities may also be found [here](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials) while a ground autonomy example may be found [here](https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/wiki/Home).

An additional note is that the `air_pressure` and `magnetometer` sensors are typically used by the autopilot.  With the current state of `cmd_vel` requiring forces you may want to implement an autopilot so as to allow your autonomy to remain _at least_ at the velocity command level.
content.html:
A good place to start will be the Wiki. The recent changes to the control of UAVs have increased the amount of effort required prior to successfully flight so I recommend starting with UGVs and then progressing to UAVs.

Nonetheless, documentation how the configurations of the two available UAVs can be found here and information on how to access data from sensor feeds as well as how to send commands to a UAV can be found here. An important note about the API for the UAVs is while the topic name is cmd_vel the values are intended to be forces as opposed to velocities.

Some additional tutorials for control/utilities may also be found here while a ground autonomy example may be found here.

An additional note is that the air_pressure and magnetometer sensors are typically used by the autopilot. With the current state of cmd_vel requiring forces you may want to implement an autopilot so as to allow your autonomy to remain at least at the velocity command level.
